author: PFCal-dev
body:
* Implementation of a new geometry class compatible with the V9 geometry. 
  * It uses `HGCSiliconDetId`, `HGCScintillatorDetId` and `HGCalTriggerDetId` to map cells and trigger cells; there is no external trigger cell mapping. 
  * Only an external motherboard mapping is needed.
  * Trigger cell neighbors are not available. So this implementation cannot be used with all the clustering algorithms for the moment. This implementation is therefore not used as default.
* Usage of DetIds is now generic in all the algos and the management of different types of DetIds has been moved to `HGCalTriggerTools`
* Minor update of the multicluster class, adding H/E in the data members

Depends on external cms-data/L1Trigger-L1THGCal#11
title: [HGCAL trigger] New implementation for the V9 geometry
